title: Twisted Consequences
description: When you choose to be with a lady, you must wonder if she is the best for you too. Many many kisses. -MichaelaTyson is a survivor, and he wants an exotic companion. An email relationship with a young lady in Romania forces him to verbalize his desire. Intrigued by the powerful emotional connection, he decides to make the journey to Bucharest. When they meet, unexpected feelings begin to contaminate their prose.
author: Irie Parker
